intro.title: Student Career Test
intro.subtitle: Discover your magical path to the perfect profession
intro.benefitsTitle: This magical test will help you:
intro.benefit2: Find professions that suit you best
intro.cta: Ready to start? Click the button below!

current_mood.placeholder: Good, because it's sunny today and I got a good grade.

hobby.placeholder: I play guitar, I love football.

habits.placeholder: I wake up at 7 AM, I read before bed.

abilities_to_develop.placeholder: Public speaking, time management, English language

favorite_character.placeholder: Harry Potter, because he is brave and always helps his friends.

antihero.text: Character you don't like and why
antihero.placeholder: Voldemort, because he is evil and selfish.

admired_relative.placeholder: Mom, because she always supports me.

not_like_relative.text: Relative you don't like and why
not_like_relative.placeholder: Uncle, because he often gets angry.

bonus_characteristics.placeholder: I love helping others, I'm interested in science.

learning_new_things_ease.text: How easily do you learn new things? (1-10)

preferred_learning_methods.text: What learning methods do you like?

quick_school_task_situation.text: Describe a situation when you quickly completed a school task
quick_school_task_situation.placeholder: I did my homework in 30 minutes because I concentrated and turned off my phone.

effort_for_results.text: How ready are you to put effort for results? (1-10)

difficult_situation_example.text: Describe a situation when you overcame a difficulty
difficult_situation_example.placeholder: I prepared for a test in one night and got a good grade.

making_new_friends_ease.text: How easily do you make new friends? (1-10)

conflict_behavior.text: How do you behave in conflict situations?
conflict_behavior.placeholder: I try to speak calmly or walk away.

center_of_attention_situation.text: Describe a situation when you were the center of attention
center_of_attention_situation.placeholder: I performed at a school concert, it was exciting but interesting.

important_for_achieving_goals.text: What is important for you to achieve goals?
important_for_achieving_goals.placeholder: Support from friends and family, belief in myself.

active_lifestyle_level.text: How active lifestyle do you lead? (1-10)

physical_fitness_methods.text: What methods of maintaining physical fitness do you use?

feeling_after_activity.text: How do you feel after active activity?
feeling_after_activity.placeholder: I feel energy and good mood.

creativity_situations.text: In what situations are you most creative?

nonstandard_solution_example.text: Describe a situation when you found a non-standard solution
nonstandard_solution_example.placeholder: I solved a math problem in a different way.

emotional_control_level.text: How well do you control emotions? (1-10)

negative_emotions_handling_methods.text: How do you cope with negative emotions?

emotional_control_example.text: Describe a situation when you successfully controlled emotions
emotional_control_example.placeholder: Before performing on stage, I calmed down, took deep breaths.

question_clarity_level.text: How clear were the questions for you? (1-10)

difficult_questions.text: What questions were difficult for you?

interesting_questions.text: What questions were interesting for you?

survey_improvement_suggestions.text: What would you add to the survey?
survey_improvement_suggestions.placeholder: Add more questions about modern professions.

ui.success: You are doing great! Keep going, young mage!
ui.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
ui.motivation: You're doing amazing! Keep going, young mage!

motivation: You're doing amazing! Keep going, young mage!
Your magical journey is just beginning!
Every answer brings you closer to your destiny!
The Guild believes in your potential!
You have the heart of a true explorer!
Greatness awaits you at the end of this quest!
Your choices shape your magical future!
Keep up the great work, apprentice!
The stars are aligning for your success!
You're unlocking new powers with every step!
Your wisdom grows with every answer!
The path of magic is made by walking it!
The Guild is proud of your progress!
